item.title: 老師說 臨帖 備展
item.description: 推薦蕙風堂冊頁80塊 一面4字 要留天地 最後一面會變色，可以不要用 算算字數，冊頁一本，80多字，90字以內 不要把兩張對開併在一起（組成一個作品）

item.title: 把拔牌蛋炒飯
item.description: 備料 🔗 米飯：隔夜冷飯，或新鮮的飯用冰水淘洗過晾乾 蔥薑蒜末 有鹹味的顆粒狀食材，例如：榨菜末、香腸丁、豌豆 雞蛋2顆，蛋液均勻攪拌，加入鹽適量 牛肉

item.description: 備料 🔗 家樂福大成安心雞翅中300g，110NTD 屏大香菇素蠔油 花椒 小茴香（孜然） 檸檬 糖 葡萄籽油 步驟 🔗 清洗雞翅 醃製雞翅 雞翅整包 蠔油若干 花椒若干

item.title: 青菜
item.description: 備料 🔗 有機青江菜 橄欖油/葡萄籽油/玄米油 調味：鹽/胡麻醬/素蠔油 步驟 🔗 清洗青菜，分葉 鍋內加5毫升油、約100ml水，預熱 加入青菜 略加鹽 燜煮約

item.title: 為何感動
item.description: 想解釋，感動的點在哪裡，但是涙點是很難描述的 只能說，情緒的鋪墊和爆發是一個隨機的過程。 整段講述，是對於瞬間的靜觀與白描，很悶的故事，卻每一幀

item.title: 我不懂得告別
item.description: 畢業季，又一次畢業季，我已早有準備。我知道我喜歡、我熟悉、我習慣的同學們又要離開我了。 我是從來不知道如何告別的。焦慮型依戀，分離恐懼症，這些

item.title: 數學分析
item.description: 分析導論 (Introduction to Analysis)： 這是一門介紹數學分析基本概念和技巧的課程，通常作為大學數學系中的入門課程。它主要涵蓋數列、極限、連續性、微積

item.title: Survival Analysis
item.description: Survival analysis 🔗Survival analysis is a captivating and practical field that has always captivated my interest. This specialized area of statistics deals with analyzing the time until an event of interest occurs. Whether applied in medical research, engineering, economics, or social sciences, survival analysis allows us to delve into the dynamics of events that are not instantaneous and are influenced by a multitude of factors. One of the most intriguing aspects of survival analysis is its ability to handle censored data.

item.title: Dancing Among the Clouds: My Aerial Dance Adventure in Taipei
item.description: My exhilarating hobby of aerial dance in Taipei fuels my passion for defying gravity and expressing myself through graceful movements on silks and hoops. Amidst challenges, I find strength, artistry, and a supportive community, balancing my academic pursuits with the soaring freedom of dance.

item.title: The Art of Seal Carving: A Journey into Ancient Elegance
item.description: Seal carving, an ancient art form blending creativity and mindfulness, captivates a student’s heart. Through intricate designs on stone and wood, this practice preserves tradition and celebrates individuality. An oasis of tranquility, seal carving fosters mental well-being and community, inviting all to explore its timeless allure.

item.title: 故宮門口撞奔馳
item.description: 6/27下午臨時起意找同學開車，本想租車的，但是他很堅持，要去開家裡的舊車，好吧，於是我開到了外雙溪，到東吳校區，到錢穆故居。 校內保安很熱情

item.title: 不知爲何有感而發
item.description: 22嵗之前的我生活在按乖分配的世界裏，乖乖上課、乖乖寫作業、乖乖參加社會活動，偶爾冒泡也好，不要出風頭也好，最最渺小透明也有按乖分配的愛和關

item.title: Markdown Syntax Guide
item.description: This article offers a sample of basic Markdown syntax that can be used in Hugo content files, also it shows whether basic HTML elements are decorated with CSS in a Hugo theme.

item.title: Rich Content
item.description: Hugo ships with several Built-in Shortcodes for rich content, along with a Privacy Config and a set of Simple Shortcodes that enable static and no-JS versions of various social media embeds.
